underlying_goal: Identify the root cause of incorrect async implementations in the codebase by analyzing skill files, async patterns, and teammate findings, then create a prioritized fix plan
brief_summary: User (team-lead) asked Claude to identify the skill gap causing incorrect async implementations and then create a prioritized fix plan; Claude thoroughly analyzed the codebase, identified the root causes (empty marketplace cheatsheet, missing forward() in async-patterns.md), and delivered a comprehensive fix plan.
